movie-description: Confused after months of work searching for material to write about a time in history that a journalist had often spoken about, Marc calls his brother David and they set off on a short vacation. But Marc cannot switch off and David takes him further south, to a place where they have heard people come to from far a field in pursuit of a fish with cat-like whiskers. Without realizing, the two brothers travel into unknown countryside where many ups and downs befell their grandfather, and come across a series of drifting characters that submerge them in a lost paradise.
movie-short-description: Directed by Marc Recha.  With David Recha, Marc Recha, Mariona Ordóñez, Pere Subirana. Twin brothers traveling the Catalan countryside encounter a reservoir of unique beauty.
